attributes.review: it took sooooo long to download, it lags a lot, it kept on making me sign in multiple times to the point where my fingers started to hurt and i had a huge headache from it. then i tried to sign back in again and it said that there wasnt an acct with my email and password.. dont get this app, its not wortk ur time.. btw it took like 6 hrs to download, ive never had an app that took SOOO long to download, and its not even worth the wait😒
attributes.title: horrible🤮

attributes.review: Wow this is so bad it should be taken off the App Store. Honestly horrendous. When I installed it on my phone it made me download a whole entire h4nta1 which by itself wasn’t bad. 🥵 however, it also stole all my data and stole all my personal information. Now I’m homeless. Thanks trump 😡😡😡😡 I don’t even have enough money for food anymore. How am I gonna feed my 13 aborted fetuses??!!!!?!1!1!1?1?1!? Hello think about the children! 🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊 bye bye bunker boi eat rocks!1!!1!1!11!1!!1!1!1!1!!1!1!11!!1
attributes.title: The worst app ever

attributes.review: This app to several hours to download, Whether I was on WiFi or my cellular data. After it was downloaded I turned on the notifications because I want to stay up to date with our president's campaign. I was sent multiple notifications of nonsense and I as an English wasn't even able to decipher them. This is a terrible app and should be taken down IMMEDIATELY!!!!!! The Trump administration should know better!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review:
This app ruined my life I got night mares and when I close my eyes I see a orange tan man in then middle of my room looking at me like 
👁👄👁 but first of all when I opened the app I saw horrifying photos of a Cheeto working out. And the worst part it’s completely I downloaded this app to see my favorite Oompa Loompa but when I got to Open it to see my moms 🧍🏻‍♀️ cousins boyfriends 👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨uncles dog 🐕chinchillas babysitter 👼🏻fathers sister. attributes.title: Worst app ever !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app and track my beloved presidents journey to another four years! HOWEVER as soon as the app was downloaded it deleted all my pictures, swiped my contacts, and quickly like our President started violating a women’s right to privacy!! I was beyond fuming! And to top it all off it deleted candy crush off my phone on level 666 and I must start at square one. Disappointed. A shame.
attributes.title: Disgusted. Betrayed. Humiliated

attributes.review: In the app it says “keep America great,” correct? Correct me if I’m wrong, but that’s what it says! So I think to myself, if America is great, the president shouldn’t be the king of racists, isn’t that right? Well, after I downloaded the app, I turned on the news, and lo and behold, Donald Trump is the president! I don’t understand why this app lies, and I want a refund. I spent a good thirty minutes trying to figure out how to download this application and I want my time back.
attributes.title: IT DOESN’T DO WHAT IT SAYS!!!

attributes.review: If I could give this app zero stars I would! DON’T download this app, it’s a scam! It took 83 weeks to download and after it finally downloaded it asked for my social security number and my personal information! I downloaded this app because I wanted to find a non racist, non homophobic, non sexist platform but instead got bombarded with horrible claims from Trump and his administration! Vile things are said against women and non white people! This APP IS HORRIBLE! It’s awful!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: When I downloaded this I instantly got a massive headache which immediately set me into a trance, drooling and mumbling “tRuMp2020”. I am a woman so obviously not a trump supporter but wanted to extend my education and learn what his psychopathic white nationalist supporters hear every day. This experience was more terrifying than I could even imagine. People on this app are terrorists and nothing short of nazis. This app is garbage- it spreads heinous lies about what is going on with our fascist president. Duh
attributes.title: One star is generous🤢🤢🤢

attributes.review: The second I opened this app, my skin started sizzling and when I looked up, I looked like a TRAFFIC CONE. It also seems to have affected my ability to form coherent sentences and I have the urge to give an unintelligible yet divisive speech. In addition to these side effects, this app is slow, glitchy, seems to be processing false inputs, and has undone every bit of progress I’ve made over the last several updates. I will not be reinstalling it.
attributes.title: SAD

attributes.review: My phone worked perfectly fine before I downloaded this app. After downloading it my phone was glitching, shutting on and off, notifications were repeating in an off matter and were even disappearing. I deleted the app shortly after to see if they would change anything since that was the only recent change to my phone and guess what?? My phone was fixed. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!
attributes.title: Do NOT download!!!
